Load packages & needed data:

```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,results='hide'}
library(kassotis2020)
library(data.table)
data(smryTbl)
```

